name: demo-clone
description: ```js function deepClone(obj) {     let newObj = Array.isArray(obj) ? [] : {}     if (obj && typeof obj === "object") {         for (let key in obj) {             if (obj.hasOwnProperty(key)) {                 newObj[key] = (obj && typeof obj[key] === 'object') ? deepClone(obj[key]) : obj[key];             }         }     }      return newObj } const newObj = deepClone(oldObj)); ```
